sentences.en: a blue and white gingham dress
a red and white gingham tablecloth
Gingham fabrics always look fresh and pretty.
sentences.cn: 方格花布织物看上去总是鲜亮好看。

sentences.en: I like this gingham skirt very much.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢这条花格棉布裙子.

sentences.en: The British return to their heritage roots with tweed, gingham and tartan making a cool comeback.
sentences.cn: 英国的斜纹呢传统的服装又回来了.花条子布料和格子织物浩浩荡荡的卷土重来.

sentences.en: The chambermaid in our corridor wears blue checked gingham aprons.
sentences.cn: 给我们扫走廊的清洁女工围蓝格围裙.

sentences.en: This company produces the gingham bedding have health care function.
sentences.cn: 本公司生产的粗布床上用品就有保健作用.

trans.tran_cn: 有条纹或方格纹的棉布，洋伞，条格平布
trans.tran_en: cotton cloth that has a pattern of small white and coloured squares on it
